value: Credits
Hello,
thanks for taking the time to read the credits!
Barly anyone does that. You can give yourself a pat on the back!
I started working on this game in 2019. In 2021 the 1.0 was released.
After that, in 2023 I wanted to do some "quick" cleanup.
That "cleanup" took all the way to 2024.
The reason? Quite simple actually.
I rewrote basicly the entire game.
At the beginning I just wanted to fix some jank.
This turned into me wanting to create reusable sections.
An before I now what happened a year has passed and I have to say... I am pretty happy with the result!
The Source code can be found under:
I also want to thank the following people:
For the neat music in this game!
For easily understandable tutorial about game mechanics and how to implement them.
As it is a must
For the motivating word to continue working on this project.
That should be all.
Smell you later,
